products.name: iPhone XS Max
products.description: The newest, biggest iPhone. Perfect camera and battery life. The best on the market.

products.name: iPhone XS
products.description: Not as big, but still great. Perfect camera and battery life. The best on the market.

products.name: iPhone XR
products.description: Plastic and good. Fine camera and battery life.

products.name: iPhone X
products.description: The best iPhone ever made. Pure perfection. Revolutionary.

products.name: iPhone 8
products.description: Not so bad. You can get a pretty good deal on them too.

products.name: iPhone 7
products.description: Okay, you're reaching a little bit. You deserve better.

products.name: iPhone 6
products.description: Really, don't do this to yourself. Get a better phone.

products.name: iPhone SE
products.description: DO NOT buy this. It is too old. Please, turn back.

products.name: iPhone 1
products.description: What is wrong with you? They don't even make these anymore. NOT FOR SALE.
